name: Bees In Arms
description:
Gather your fellow bees and protect your hive from the beekeeper.

Use the joystick to move. Tap on the screen to attack with your stinger. Gather pollen for your hive to make honey, share it with other bees to make friends. With enough friends you can defend your hive.

Currently the apk has a bug... not the buzzing kind. So please see alternate instructions for downloading and playing the source files directly from the engine (it's free). Our apologies for the inconvenience.
